text:
Bunda sudah pergi dari meja makan beberapa saat setelah Selena turun dari kamarnya.
Selesai makan Jimin mencuci piring bekas mereka berdua sedangkan Selena membersihkan meja makan. Tadinya Selena ingin mencuci piring namun ditahan oleh Jimin, pria itu bilang biar dia yang mencuci piring, jadi ya sudah akhirnya Selena memilih membersihkan meja makan biar sama-sama kerja.
Selang beberapa menit kemudian mereka telah menyelesaikan tugas masing-masing dan sekarang kini mereka tengah duduk berdua di ruang keluarga sambil menonton serial tv yang entah judul nya apa.
"Bep, besok gue izin cabut ya" Ungkap Jimin setelah beberapa saat terdiam.
"Kesambet apaan lo mau cabut pake izin dulu"
Jimin berdecak, gak izin salah giliran izin malah dikira kesambet.
"Kan biar lo gak nunggu gue di kelas gitu loh bep"
"Mau cabut kemana lo!"
"Itu anu... Apasi gue mau nongkrong ama temen" Jawab Jimin terbata.
trans:
Mommy had left the dining table shortly after Selena came down from her room.
Once they finished eating Jimin washed their dishes while Selena cleaned the dining table. At first Selena wanted to wash the dishes but was held back by Jimin, the man said to let him wash the dishes, so in the end Selena chose to clean the dining table so that they both worked together.
A few minutes later they had completed their tasks and were now sitting together in the living room while watching a tv series of who knows what title.
"Babe, I’m going to ask for permission to skip class tomorrow" Jimin said after a moment of silence.
“Why the hell do you ask for permission to skip class”
Jimin clicked his tongue, annoyed that his request was misunderstood; skipping class was mistaken for something sinister.
“It's so you don't wait for me in class babe”
“Where are you going!”
“That's a... I want to hang out with my friends” Jimin replied stammering.
